outputFile.comment: The base path to save the generated image. A numeric suffix will automatically be created before the .png file extension.
colorTextFG.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorNodeOffline.comment: The color of the text for an offline node expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorNodeDead.comment: The color of the text for a node that has been offline for 1008 blocks expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorBackground.comment: The color of the background for the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorRowBG1.comment: The primary color to use as the background for data rows expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorRowBG2.comment: The alternate color to use as the background for data rows expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorRowFG1.comment: The color of the text for data rows on primary color background expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorRowFG2.comment: The color of the text for data rows on alternate color background expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image. Default is 480
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image. Default is 320
sleepInterval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
pageSize.comment: The number of channels to represent per page rendered
